alert.note: Alert for Adams; Highland; Pike; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:41PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHERN ADAMS, WESTERN PIKE, SOUTHEASTERN HIGHLAND AND NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Belfast, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Peebles, Seaman, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Belfast, Sinking Spring, Poplar Grove, Elm Grove, May Hill, Serpent Mound, Locust Grove, Buchanan, Ladd, Smoky Corners and Idaho. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
